and the total amount of the price (is) twelve dînârs and a sixth,
and thereto for the making of them an eighth of a [dîn]âr is added per each robe, so that it comes to one dînâr and a half.
The total amount including the [ma]king (is) thirteen dînârs and two thirds of a dînâr.
